title: Competition from Fortnite helps EA, Activision, says Ross Gerber
text:
Competition from Fortnite helps EA, Activision, says Ross Gerber Wednesday, May 09, 2018 - 04:58
Fortnite's growth expands the market for video games so it's a positive for Electronic Arts and Activision, Gerber Kawasaki's CEO says in an interview with Reuters' Fred Katayama. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Fortnite's growth expands the market for video games so it's a positive for Electronic Arts and Activision, Gerber Kawasaki's CEO says in an interview with Reuters' Fred Katayama.
